step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM LC_LINK_MESH P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_LINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM LC_LINK P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_NODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.NODE_PID FROM LC_NODE_MESH M, (SELECT NODE_PID FROM LC_NODE_MESH WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]) N WHERE N.NODE_PID = M.NODE_PID GROUP BY N.NODE_PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1) );

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_FACE (PID) ( SELECT DISTINCT FT.FACE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM LC_LINK_MESH M, TEMP_LC_LINK N WHERE N.PID = M.LINK_PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1) T, LC_FACE_TOPO FT WHERE T.PID = FT.LINK_PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_LINK (PID) (SELECT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_LC_FACE P, LC_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_LINK (PID) (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM LC_LINK L WHERE L.S_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_LC_NODE) UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM LC_LINK L WHERE L.E_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_LC_NODE) );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM LC_FACE P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_FACE (PID) (SELECT P.FACE_PID FROM LC_FACE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_FEATURE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.FEATURE_PID FROM LC_FACE P, TEMP_LC_FACE T WHERE P.FEATURE_PID!=0 AND P.FEATURE_PID!=-1 AND P.FACE_PID=T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_LINK (PID) (SELECT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_LC_FACE P, LC_FACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_NODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM LC_LINK P, TEMP_LC_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION ALL SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM LC_LINK P, TEMP_LC_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM LC_FACE P,TEMP_LC_FACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM LC_FACE P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_FACE T );
DELETE FROM LC_FACE_TOPO P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_FACE T );
DELETE FROM LC_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_LINK T );
DELETE FROM LC_LINK_MESH P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_LINK T );
DELETE FROM LC_LINK_KIND P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_LINK T );
DELETE FROM LC_NODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_NODE T );
DELETE FROM LC_NODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_NODE T );
DELETE FROM LC_FEATURE P WHERE P.FEATURE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_FEATURE T );
DELETE FROM LC_FACE_NAME P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_LC_FACE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_FACE SELECT FACE_PID FROM LC_FACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM LC_FACE B WHERE A.FACE_PID = B.FACE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_LINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM LC_LINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM LC_LINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_NODE SELECT NODE_PID FROM LC_NODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM LC_NODE B WHERE A.NODE_PID = B.NODE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_LC_FEATURE SELECT FEATURE_PID FROM LC_FEATURE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM LC_FEATURE B WHERE A.FEATURE_PID = B.FEATURE_PID);
